summary: Nazi rocket scientist - Operation Paperclip, NASA, Apollo program architect
key_facts: Nazi SS officer, V-2 rocket designer (Peenemünde)
Army Ballistic Missile Agency, later NASA
Saturn V rocket architect - Apollo moon program
Alleged deathbed warning about 'extraterrestrial threat' narrative
concealment: Operation Paperclip whitewashed Nazi records, SS membership hidden until 1980s
